expected-result.ddl: drop table if exists prod; create table prod \( id integer\({0}\) not null, name char\({1}\), primary key \( id \) \); drop table if exists category; create table category \( id char\({1}\) not null, name char\({1}\), primary key \( id \) \);
drop table if exists category_prod; create table category_prod \( category_id char\({1}\) not null, prod_id integer\({0}\) not null, primary key \( category_id, prod_id \) \);

alter table category_prod add constraint category_prod_categories foreign key category_prod_categories \(category_id \) references category \(id \) ; alter table category_prod add constraint category_prod_products foreign key category_prod_products \(prod_id \) references prod \(id \) ;
